issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:

{code}

Cannot complete the install because of a conflicting dependency.

comments.body: same problem but in an earlier version. Closed but not fixed.
same issue, was closed but not fixed
It appears you are attempting to install Appcelerator Studio over Titanium Studio. This will cause problems. Are you sure you have the correct update URL?

I just click the update button because studio gives me a message that an update is available. Thats it.

I start titanium studio, it gives me a message in a popup with "titanium updates available.. Click here to install the latest updates". Clicking on this shows a confirmation window to install titanium 3.4.01409237002. Clicking ok shows a box with "errors encountered during update"

To get 3.4.0 in the first place I followed your instructions here:
http://preview.appcelerator.com/appcelerator/studio/standalone/update/rc/

thats all I know.

[~rvwoens] Can you send us the screenshot of the preference page at Install/Update > Available Software Sites (and make sure the Location column is clearly visible)? We would like to know which URL is selected to check for updates.

Also, provide us the current installation details screenshot of Studio through 'About Titanium Studio > Installation Details'.
Along with the screenshots, can you attach the error message details that you are seeing while updating Studio.
screenshot of install/update available software sites
error message details while installing update
Praveen, i've uploaded 3 screenshots as per your request

There you go. You have added the update sites for both the products Titanium Studio and Appcelerator Studio. Can you please un-select (or remove) the update site related to appc-studio with name 'driepuntvier' and then, 'check for Titanium updates' from Help menu.

same problem. I;ve unchecked "driepuntvier" (dutch for 3.4) and the same error appears when do "check for updates" in the help menu:

Error encountered during update

so if I understand what you are saying I need to uninstall "appcelerator studio" somehow.

The current installation has duplicate entries for 'Titanium Studio'. I don't know how did it end up into this situation, but I guess you might have accidentally installed Appcelerator or Titanium Studio product on top of the existing installation. Instead of removing all of those duplication entries and fixing the current installation, I would recommend to download the new RC release from http://preview.appcelerator.com/studio/
